search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SugarCRM (sugarcrm7.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the pricing page of SugarCRM is: [https://www.sugarcrm.com/request-pricing/](https://www.sugarcrm.com/request-pricing/)【3:2†source】.
